fields.fieldTitle: What's the title of your survey?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: For Sale By Owner Seller Survey; Funnel Scripts Survey; Nerve Pain Survey, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's your keyword focus topic area?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: online business, tennis, nerve pain

fields.fieldTitle: What is your topic? (Starts with VERB ending in "ing")

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: operating your business, playing tennis, suffering from pain

fields.fieldTitle: What's the big result people want in this area? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint1: "If you're like most people, you really want to ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: get more traffic, improve your serve, lower your golf score, stop your nerve pain, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Basic audience identification choices (Bullet list one per line)

fieldHint.hint1: "A person taking this survey could be one of the following_____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: male / female; new author / published author / aspiring author

fields.fieldTitle: What is a question that identifies them based on the subject of the survey?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Do you have a funnel?; Have you written a book yet?; Do you need to sell without an agent?, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What are the answer choices for the previous subject question? (Bullet list one per line)

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Man over 30 / 40 / 50; I have a working funnel / I have one but don't use it / what's a funnel?

fields.fieldTitle: What is a question that self declares their current level of skill / accomplishment?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How much revenue does your business currently bring in per month?; How would you rate your ability at selling your books?

fields.fieldTitle: What are the answer choices for the skill / accomplishment level question? (Bullet list one per line

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: $0-5k / $5k-$25k, etc.; 0-100 / 100-200, etc.; I'm a newbie / I'm okay / I'm a book selling ninja!, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What are the answer choices for the question "What's your biggest current challenge?" (Bullet list one per line)

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: I can't get enough customers / My business is stuck / I don't have enough money, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What are the answer choices for the question "Which of these 3 issues do you suffer from most?" (Bullet list one per line)

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: I have no money for ads / I run out of money for ads quickly / I don't know how much a customer costs

fields.fieldTitle: What is a random, seemingly unrelated question you can use to hook them at the end?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Are you drinking water first thing in the morning?; Did you map out the marketing of your book BEFORE you started writing?

fields.fieldTitle: What are the answer choices for the seemingly unrelated question? (Bullet list one per line)
